segments.text: Mom , am I like a superman ? All I need is a cape .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Mom , you always think of me as a child .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , because a real man doesn't need Mom to worry about him so much . He can do things by himself .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Oh , my poor Danny , sure , you are a man . But you know , running like this in street is very dangerous .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Superman is not afraid of any danger .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you remember the rules of road safety ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Walk the sidewalk and please right-hand side .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Don't play on the street or make any noise .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , so you still remember , ah .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Dear Mom , please permit of superman's naughty .
segments.speaker: S1
